event_rate.title: Event rate (messages / sec)
event_rate.description: The number of messages the prometheus impulse source will emit per second

event_time_interval.title: Event time interval (Âµs)
event_time_interval.description: The number of microseconds in between the event times of subsequent events emmitted by the source; if not set wall-clock time is used

message_count.title: Message count
message_count.description: The number of messages the prometheus impulse source will emit before stopping; if not set the source will run forever

metric_name.title: Metric name
metric_name.description: The name of the Prometheus metric to generate

metric_type.title: Metric type
metric_type.description: The type of Prometheus metric (gauge or counter)

value_scale.title: Value scale
value_scale.description: Maximum value for generated metric values

distribution.title: Distribution type
distribution.description: Distribution for generating metric values (only uniform supported)

num_labels.title: Number of labels
num_labels.description: Number of labels to generate for each metric

cardinality_per_label.title: Cardinality per label
cardinality_per_label.description: Comma-separated list of cardinality values for each label. If single value, applies to all labels.
